title: Find distance traveled from v-t graph

content.question: The graph above shows the speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of a car on a horizontal road as a function of time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="12" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn></math> seconds. The distance traveled by the car during this time interval is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
